dt-option.name: columns.searchable
dt-option.summary: Enable or disable search on the data in this column
dt-option.description: Using this parameter, you can define if DataTables should include this column in the filterable data in the table. You may want to use this option to disable search on generated columns such as 'Edit' and 'Delete' buttons for example.

example.title: Disable search on the first column with `dt-init columnDefs`
Disable search on the first column with `dt-init columns`
